description.content: To tackle unexpected costs that arise for the duration of the month applying for any short phrase mortgage is additional useful than a long phrase loan product or service. The primary advantage with short-term options will be the actuality that you can always spend back again once you obtain your up coming paycheck. Acquiring these quick phrase loans on time is totally trouble absolutely free, it doesn't call for any paper operate to become faxed nor does it imply any lengthy verification processes prior to you'll be able to really possess the dollars in hand. It's also significant to understand the numerous loan items; here really are a couple of pointers to far better realize brief phrase loans. The usage of brief expression loansEarlier than you finalise in your mortgage item the initial matter you would like to carry out is determine and discover out what fits your need to have finest. When your money need is time bound with no wait time for approvals or paper get the job done, it can be an indicator the utilization is ideally for an emergency goal. The appropriate option here is always to apply for brief phrase loans and obtain them on time.Uncomplicated application practiceIn case you are thinking about speedy cash in desperate cases just present your employer's personalized and contact facts to have the mortgage. The application practice is extremely uncomplicated, which can be completed on the net. They may be time efficient and confidential.Be choosy to avail in the greatest prices within the market placeSince that you are applying for any brief term mortgage only throughout a desperate cash-crunch circumstances, there is a chance of you not gathering the right info around the several rates prevailing in the marketplace. To have the perfect rates offered inside industry, it really is recommended to complete a rapid exploration by exploring internet websites that provide comparisons on on the net loan provider charges to know and select the perfect offer.Easy repayment moduleJust one delay in repaying any mortgage that you just had taken or defaulting a credit card bill payment would harm your excellent credit rating. Having said that inside case of the brief term loan acquired from a web-based payday financial institution in UK it is possible to in fact have it rolled more than a few occasions. By doing so you would only have to spend minimal loan total expenses, which may bring down the balance to some extent. You'll be able to usually have them repaid in straightforward installments.The disadvantage of acquiring an extended expression mortgage to get a short-term objectiveWhen an extended term merchandise is acquired for short phrase usage, keep in mind the repayment cycle for that availed mortgage quantity is prolonged. It would remain a burden for years prior to you could possibly shell out it off utterly. There is certainly also the possibility of you ending-up paying larger interest than what you had expected. Should you are in have to have of a little dollars and prepared to repay within a shorter duration then applying for a brief term loan could be the finest deal for you.The standards surrounding mortgage eligibilityShort phrase loans are supplied to individuals that are above 18 a long time of age and residing while in the UK. The other criterion is usually to have a normal job and be paid on a month to month basis. Also be sure you have an energetic financial institution account that can acquire immediate deposits.

description.hltext_display: Haslam names Hatter to head DHS
description.content:
TENNESSEEGov.-elect Bill Haslam has named Raquel Hatter, president of a Nashville family services organization, to be commissioner of the Department of Human Services. "Dr. Hatter is a passionate expert in her field, and I'm proud that she'll join our team in the new administration," Haslam said in a statement released Tuesday. "She's shown a dedication to families and children throughout her life, and Tennessee will be served well with her as Commissioner of Human Services."
Hatter served as president and chief executive of Family & Children's Service for the past three years. She also serves on the Tennessee Council on Children's Mental Health, the Alliance for Children & Families' public policy committee, the National Building Bridges Initiative's cultural and linguistic competence committee and the American Association of Children's Residential Centers' board of directors.Related CHAS SISK
THE TENNESSEAN

description.hltext_display: 国土部加大政策力度坚决抑制地价过快上涨
description.content:
中新社北京12月21日电 (记者 阮煜琳)国土资源部官员21日表示，近半个月来，一些地区“地王”、“天价地”在短时间内相对集中地重新出现，推动整体地价走高。要进一步加大已有政策措施执行力度，坚决抑制地价过快上涨。防止受多种因素驱动放量供地，防止出现新的高价地，影响地产市场预期。
今年前三季度全国重点城市居住地价保持了总体平稳。国土资源部地价监测数据显示，在调控政策作用下，今年前三季度，全国居住地价同比增速放缓，第二、三季度环比增幅均低于第一季度，地价水平趋稳。
国土资源部公布的最新数据显示，今年前11个月土地供应总量再创新高，全国房地产用地供应12.82万公顷，同比增加47.8%。住宅用地供应9.56万公顷，同比增加50.6%，占房地产用地供应总量约75%。今年前11个月保障性住房用地供应1.34万公顷，同比增加43.5%，占住宅用地比例达14%。
国土资源部官员表示，继9月份部分地方房地产市场出现反弹苗头后，进入11月，特别是近半个月来，一些地方地产市场购地竞价热度趋旺，所谓“地王”、“天价地”在短时间内相对集中地重新出现，推动整体地价走高。为巩固调控成果，进一步加大已有政策措施贯彻落实力度，国土资源部19日晚下发了《严格落实房地产用地调控政策促进土地市场健康发展有关问题的通知》。
国土资源部官员表示，下一步，国土资源部将督促各地做好当前和近期土地市场的监管工作。把握好供地总量、时序、节奏，进一步优化结构和布局。年底前，各地要推进未完成的保障性住房供地计划尽快落地。
同时，继续加强城市地价动态监测，建立土地交易异常情况快报制度，研究具体政策措施，遏制过度竞争，坚决抑制地价过快上涨。规范房地产用地出让行为。加快闲置土地清理查处，坚决打击违法违规用地行为。要求各地尽快着手编制2011年住房建设用地供应计划。

description.hltext_display: Nueva Zelanda desclasifica 2.000 informes militares sobre ovnis y extraterrestres avistados
description.author: EFE
description.content:
EFE
El Ejército de Nueva Zelanda desclasificó hoy cientos de informes militares hasta ahora secretos sobre presuntos avistamientos de ovnis y encuentros con alienígenas, informó la radio nacional.
Más de 2.000 páginas de datos incluyen testimonios de civiles, militares y pilotos comerciales que afirmaron haber visto en el cielo objetos voladores no identificados , aunque casi todos fueron simples efectos de los movimientos de la luz.
Los informes contienen dibujos de platillos volantes, detalladas descripciones de extraterrestres que portaban máscaras similares a las de los faraones egipcios y textos supuestamente escritos por marcianos. Un caso concreto relata un avistamiento en 1978 de luces extrañas a bordo de un avión comercial cerca de la población de Kaikoura en la Isla Sur. Imágenes de un fenómeno De acuerdo a los documentos desclasificados, uno de los pasajeros era un reportero de televisión que grabó imágenes del fenómeno , que suscitó un enorme interés hasta que la Fuerza Aérea lo investigó y concluyó que se trataba de un reflejo poco común del planeta Venus.
Los papeles, elaborados entre 1954 y 2009, fueron publicados bajo la ley de libertad de información de Nueva Zelanda y todos los nombres fueron suprimidos para proteger la identidad de las personas implicadas.

description.hltext_display: El 75.869 y el 73.684, agraciados con dos de los quintos premios
description.content:
SOCIEDAD. El número 75.869 ha resultado agraciado con uno de los quintos premios del Sorteo Extraordinario de Lotería de Navidad, dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, que ha recaído en Galicia, Cataluña y Castilla y León.

recaído en Galicia, Cataluña y Castilla y León.
El número fue cantado a las 9,33 horas en el séptimo alambre de la primera tabla.
Por su parte, el número 73.684 ha resultado agraciado con otro de los quintos premios del Sorteo Extraordinario de Lotería de Navidad, dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, el segundo premio de la mañana.
El número fue cantado a las 9,47 horas en el tercer alambre de la segunda tabla.

description.hltext_display: Набиуллина: Повышение пенсионного возраста в России неприемлемо
Un camión cargado de bombonas choca contra una valla y su conductor fallece
description.author: elmundo.es
description.content:
El suceso se produjo esta madrugada
No se descarta de que la víctima padeciera alguna enfermedad
Ical | Palencia
Un varón de 49 años, con iniciales F.J.G.C, falleció esta madrugada en torno a las 4.10 horas, después de que el camión que conducía por la A-65, en dirección hacia la A-67, se estrellase contra la valla de seguridad de la calzada en el kilómetro 7,7, a la altura del término municipal de Palencia capital.
El vehículo, cargado de bombonas de butano, impactó y los efectivos sanitarios del Servicio de Emergencia 112 trasladados al lugar del siniestro confirmaron el fallecimiento del conductor.
Desde la Dirección General de Tráfico informan de que por el momento no se ha descartado que el conductor sufriera una enfermedad que provocase el accidente.

They preserve a close eye on your placement to secure you from pointless danger and exposure. They are not called bean counters for nothing.Having said that, they'd wish to add they may be not just ordinary accountants. Every a single of them glimpse at the 'big picture' and approach the occupation from an holistic viewpoint - generating positive they realize your goals and ambitions and what outcomes you'd wish to realize. Following the widespread injury in Christchurch plus the Canterbury region subsequent the earthquake on 4 September 2010, your focus is most likely moving from guaranteeing your loved ones are protected for your business, and assessing any losses which you might have incurred.Business contingency planning amongNearly all businesses can have Material Harm policies which will cover the expense of repairs to home, plant and equipment , and loss of inventory and so forth.Business interruption insurance coverage is a vital component of one's organization risk management. That is just the time that which you require this policy and it could be capable to supply compensation for you as a company owner.Organization interruption insurance coverage can cover your gross revenue, wages, added prices of operating, file re-instatement; and if a landlord, for loss of rents.

description.hltext_display: Еврокомисията отказа да се криминализира отричането на престъпленията на комунизма
Winterwetter kostet Deutschland mindestens drei Milliarden Euro
description.content:
Das harte Winterwetter ist nicht nur ein Ärgernis für Reisende. Die Kapriolen werden auch das deutsche Wirtschaftswachstum nach Verbandsangaben deutlich dämpfen. Der Deutsche Industrie- und Handelskammertag geht davon aus, dass Wertschöpfung in Milliardenhöhe verloren geht. Das drückt das BIP-Wachstum spürbar. Auch im Hamburger Hafen stockt's gewaltig. Quelle: dapd
HB BERLIN/FRANKFURT. Eine lange und schneereiche Frostperiode könne drei Milliarden Euro an Wertschöpfung kosten, sagte der Chefvolkswirt des Deutschen Industrie- und Handelskammertages, Volker Treier, der „Berliner Zeitung“ laut Vorab-Bericht. Das entspreche einer Verlangsamung des Wirtschaftswachstum von 0,5 Prozent im Quartal. Die Einschätzung basiere auf den Erfahrungen mit dem Winterwetter vom Jahresanfang 2010. Insgesamt seien die Konjunkturkräfte aber stark genug, um diesen Dämpfer einigermaßen zu verkraften.
Neben den Transportbereichen hat vor allem das Baugewerbe mit einem Umsatzeinbruch zu kämpfen. Der harte Winter koste die Branche die Hälfte ihres normalen Umsatzes im Dezember. Während im Schnitt in einem Dezember sieben bis acht Milliarden Euro umgesetzt würden, dürften es in diesem Jahr drei bis vier Milliarden Euro weniger sein, sagte die Sprecherin des Zentralverbands des Baugewerbes, Ilona Klein, der Zeitung. Für die Branche sei es 2010 ein hartes Jahr gewesen, Auch von Januar bis März habe man nicht richtig arbeiten können.
Derweil hat sich die Wetterlage in der Nacht spürbar geändert: Temperaturen über dem Gefrierpunkt bringen Schnee und Eis zumindest in Süddeutschland vielerorts zum Schmelzen: „Im Norden kalt, im Süden mild“, bilanzierte der Deutsche Wetterdienst DWD im hessischen Offenbach am frühen Mittwoch. Mit Stand von 4.00 Uhr am Morgen lagen die Temperaturen in Konstanz, Stuttgart und Frankfurt am Main im Plusbereich. In München waren es null, in Nürnberg minus ein Grad. Köln und Dresden lagen mit einem Grad geradeso im Plus.
Weiter gen Norden wurde es kälter, beispielsweise mit minus sechs Grad in Hannover, minus sieben Grad in Bremen und Rostock, minus fünf in Hamburg und minus acht Grad in Berlin. Dieses Temperaturgefälle zwischen Nord und Süd soll laut DWD-Prognose generell anhalten, wobei jedoch die milderen Temperaturen in die Mitte Deutschlands vorrücken.
In Baden-Württemberg und Bayern war das Tauwetter schon am frühen Morgen vielerorts zu beobachten, wie eine Umfrage bei den größeren Polizeidienststellen ergab. Leichte Plusgrade gab es fast überall. Das harte Winterwetter ist nicht nur ein Ärgernis für Reisende. Die Kapriolen werden auch ... Das hoch verschuldete Spanien hat auf dem Weg zur Sanierung des Staatshaushalts ein erstes...

description.hltext_display: Bess and Arefein lead Penquis past Dexter
description.author: Marc Calnan, Eastern Maine High School Sports Examiner
description.content:
Dexter- For the Penquis Patriots to have a successful season they will need the seniors and the freshmen to contribute. The Patriots started three seniors and two freshmen Tuesday evening against the Dexter Tigers. Contributions is what they got from a freshmen and a senior in the first quarter. Freshman Isaiah Bess nailed two shots from behind in the three point arch in the first quarter. Jerell Arefein scored six points, grabbed six rebounds and two steals as Penquis took a 14-6 lead after the first eight minutes. The Patriots held on for a 53-45 victory over the Tigers.
Dexter cut the lead to 14-9 early in the second quarter. Penquis went on a 9-0 run to take their biggest lead of the game. Coach Peter Murray called a timeout and Dexter looked like a different team after that timeout. The Tigers outscored the Patriots 10-4 the rest of the quarter to cut the lead to 27-19 going into halftime. The Tigers played well the rest of the way but Coach Murray knows that coming back when you get down early is never easy.
"You can't get behind. It takes a lot of energy to come back." Murray said, "All it takes is one play and it is a back breaker. All that hard work and you are right back where you started."
The Patriots could not build the lead back up in the third quarter as the Tigers stayed within 10 of the Patriots behind the shooting of Andrew O'Brien. The Tigers cut the lead to six (35-29) with two minutes left in the quarter. The Patriots scored the final four points of the quarter to take a 39-29 lead going into the fourth quarter. O'Brien went 2-2 from three point range in the quarter.
"Andrew (O'Brien) has that kind of potential." Murray said, "As far as shooting is concerned, we do not have a tremendous amount of it. He (O'Brien) is probably the most consistent shooter we have."
Bryan Russell is the leader scorer for Coach Tony Hamlin's Penquis squad. Russell is averaging 20 points a game this season. Russell had trouble getting it going for the Patriots on Tuesday evening. Russell finished with seven points, he went 2-16 shooting from the field including 0-9 from three point range. Trevor Lyford averages 12 points a game and he also finished with seven.
"That is 20 points a game that wasn't there." Hamlin said, "Two minutes left in the half, I think he (Russell) had two points. Trevor Lyford struggled. He is averaging 12. That is 32 points. They probably had a dozen between them."
"That is a credit to Dexter's defense. They played well. They were disciplined, well coached. Even though they are down talent wise, you know when you play Peter's (Murray) teams they are going to be disciplined." Hamlin added.
Dexter (1-3) outscored Penquis 16-14 in the final quarter. O'Brien, Tim Gustin and Trevor Fogarty combined for all of the Tigers points in the fourth quarter. Gustin led the Tigers with 14 points, O'Brien finished with 12, Brandon Leighton added eight and Casey Jordan chipped in with six. Dexter will next play on Monday when they host Central.
Penquis was led by Bess with 15 points, Arefein put in 14 points. Arefein finished with a double-double as he also grabbed 10 rebounds knows his team did not play there best game.
"We really didn't play that well." Arefein said, "I think we need to come in knowing teams are better than we think they are. We need to not get caught off guard."
Penquis (3-1) still has one more game before the Christmas weekend. They will host PCHS of Guilford on Thursday.

event_or_fact.property: Gustin led the Tigers with 14 points, O'Brien finished with 12
All it takes is one play and it is a back breaker.; All that hard work and you are right back where you started.
I think we need to come in knowing teams are better than we think they are.; We need to not get caught off guard.
As far as shooting is concerned, we do not have a tremendous amount of it.
Two minutes left in the half, I think he (Russell) had two points.; Trevor Lyford struggled. He is averaging 12. That is 32 points. They probably had a dozen between them.

description.hltext_display: UPL denuncia el nepotismo imperante en el 90% de la plantilla municipal
description.author: Susana Martín
description.content:
El expediente abierto por los años de absentismo laboral del alcalde de Villaquilambre en su puesto de informático en el Ayuntamiento de León sigue abierto.
Sin embargo, este proceso que desde noviembre investiga la Concejalía de Personal contra el leonesista Lázaro García Bayón está levantando ampollas en el Consistorio e incluso parece haber desembocado en una aguda tensión política entre los socios del Gobierno municipal, PSOE y UPL.
Este martes, Gema Cabezas arremetió contra Ibán García del Blanco, edil de Personal, a quien acusó de favorecer a sus amigos en puestos de trabajo del Consistorio.
Sin tener en cuenta su doble implicación en el caso (Bayón pertenece al área de Informática, del que es responsable Gema Cabezas, edil de Nuevas Tecnologías; y ambos son además dirigentes del mismo partido, UPL), y en lugar de implicarse en su resolución, la edil de Nuevas Tecnologías arremetía contra Ibán García del Blanco: "Hace tres años que le he pedido que saque la plaza de jefe de Informática, pero no le da la gana, sólo saca las de sus amigos". Y más: "Hay áreas del Ayuntamiento sobredimensionadas de personal, y otras que estamos fatal y nos dicen a todo que no".
Irritada, Cabezas explicó a este periódico la mala situación de su departamento desde que ELMUNDO.es publicara el reportaje 'Ausentes con sueldos de lujo', donde se denunciaban las sistemáticas ausencias de sus puestos de trabajo de algunos funcionarios que también son políticos.
El caso más flagrante es el de Lázaro García Bayón, alcalde de Villaquilambre e informático en el Consistorio leonés, una plaza por la que no ha aparecido desde hace más de una década pese a que sigue cobrando su nómina cada mes ("Trabajo desde casa", argumenta Bayón, un extremo que corrobora Cabezas y que justifica con el uso del control remoto).

description.hltext_display: Audiences TV : TF1 en tête avec Il était une fois, bon score pour TMC
description.author: Premiere
description.content:
Ambiance Noël hier soir sur les chaînes de télévision. C'est TF1 qui arrive en tête des audiences de première partie de soirée avec le film Il était une fois. France 2 suit avec Alvin et les Chipmunks. France 3 se classe en 3ème position avec le divertissement Noël sous les étoiles. M6 glane la 4ème marche du podium avec la série NCIS. C'est TMC qui arrive largement en tête des audiences de la TNT. Mardi 21 décembre 2010, TF1 diffusait le film Il était une fois qui a enchanté 6 465 000 personne soit une part d'audience de 24%. Victime d'un mauvais sort, une princesse de dessin animé se retrouve propulsé en plein Manhattan où elle prend forme humaine. Au casting de ce conte fée sentimental on retrouve le sexy Patrick Dempsey ( Grey's Anatomy ), Amy Adams et Susan Sarandon . La magie de noël est lancée et les chaînes s'en donnent à coeur joie avec une programmation spéciale qui attire les téléspectateurs et le jeune public en vacances.
France 2 proposait à 20h35 le film Alvin et les Chipmunks qui mélange personnages réels et animés. 4 344 000 personnes ont suivi les aventures des 3 petits tamias qui partent à l'assaut des hits parade ce qui représente 15.4% du public. Jason Lee , David Cross et Cameron Richardson sont à l'affiche de ce film réalisé en 2007. Une satire gentillette du show-biz qui a fait rire petits et grands. Pari réussi pour la chaîne.
France 3 affichait également une ambiance de fête à 20h35 avec le divertissement Noël sous les étoiles qui a attiré 3 844 000 téléspectateurs soit une part d'audience de 14.2%. Daniela Lumbroso recevait Philippe Candeloro , Chantal Goya , Lara Fabian , Patrick Fiori ...
M6 a décidé de placer cette soirée sous le signe de l'amour en diffusant dès 20h45 des épisodes de la série NCIS : enquêtes spéciales mettant en avant la relation compliquée entre l'agent Di Nozzo ( Michael Weatherly ) et Ziva David ( Cote de Pablo ). 3 732 000 fans ont suivi leurs... Autres articles :

description.hltext_display: 2010 Goes Viral: YouTube's Best Videos
description.content:
Check Out The Year's 5 Best Viral Video Offerings
Joshua Nichols, Staff writer
SAMANTHA SIN/AFP/
YouTube has become such a part of our lives that it sometimes seems like it's been around forever.
In reality, the website only turned 5 years old this year. Then again, five years might as well be five decades when it comes to the Internet.
The video sharing site has grown so fast for one reason: everybody loves a good viral video. After all, nothing gets an office buzzing or sends e-mails flying quite like a sneezy baby Panda or a home video of a stupid person about to do something even stupider.
Every year brings great viral videos, but 2010 was a banner year, almost as if the video gods planned a special treat for YouTube's fifth birthday. With that in mind, we sorted through the best videos of the year to come up with the following five viral gems.
Viral Video No. 5: So Beautiful! >>

description.hltext_display: 政策调控宜早不宜迟
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
等趋势明了后才出台调控政策,最后便容易“踏空”――被迫严厉紧缩
【财新网】(特约作者 陈勇)决策层和市场在玩“猫捉老鼠”游戏。在CPI再创新高之后,加息“靴子”迟迟未落地,市场在焦灼中对货币政策渐渐有些麻木。虽然决策者可以做到出其不意,但如此政策迟缓,最终受打击的还是实体经济。
通胀之火蔓延
我们此前曾提出,现在也存在有利于通胀回落的因素:一,农产品价格上涨具有周期性,这意味着短期物价上涨动能将减弱。分析本世纪以来的农产品价格波动周期可发现,周期性上涨一般持续18-24个月,中国的本轮上涨已经历13个月;二,虽然劳动力成本上升可能成为影响通胀的长期因素,但截至今年三季度的制造业数据表明,工人实际工资增速比去年同期下降,也就是说,劳动力成本没有出现加速上升;三,既然“需求是以货币表达的需要”,货币已经趋势性收紧,M1增速高点出现在2010年1月,从中国的经验数据看,货币(M1)传导至物价(CPI)的滞后期为6-12个月,货币收紧的滞后影响也即将体现为物价回落。
在政策宣示上,政府控通胀的决心显而易见。10月20日加息,近期连续三次上调存款准备金率,同时,政府相关部门还通过行政手段打击投机行为,如果调控力度持续,我们有理由预期通胀之火将逐渐被浇灭。
问题是,雨量不够大,通胀之火仍在延续。如今只闻雷声不见雨,我们担心这种有风的气候条件下,风助火势蔓延。
CPI达年内新高时,央行上调存款准备金率0.5个百分点,一次性冻结资金约3500亿。联系到11月份约3200亿的新增外汇占款和超预期的信贷投放,这一政策动作显得过于“稳健”,只是对冲了11月份的货币超发问题。
加息预期未兑现,负利率进一步扩大。持续负利率是对负债的补贴,强化了“再杠杆”,对通胀形成刺激作用。能负债者,往往是那些财富占有或在资源分配中具有优势的群体,这将恶化收入分配结构。负利率进一步降低无风险收益率,导致风险偏好上升,调控虽然打击某些投机行为,但不能改变资金逐利性,理性的资产配置行为将是减少现金或存款,增加商品和资产,这是负利率刺激通胀的另一个渠道。
升值预期同样形成通胀压力。当名义汇率存在升值压力时,如果汇率被“管理”,升值压力便会通过通胀释放出来,最终导致实际汇率升值。本世纪以来的历次通胀,都与升值预期强化不无相关:从2003-2004年、2006-2008年、以及2010年,都是升值预期先抬头,通胀随即上升。按照当前的升值节奏,至少到2011年上半年,人民币升值预期不会明显弱化,升值压力对通胀压力的传导不容忽视。
政策不确定性
通胀和升值预期在持续,而宏观政策温和且滞后,这是我们判断通胀短期内存在不确定性的主要原因,短期通胀的担忧远大于中期。
11月份价格涨势趋弱的规律已被打破。因为前期涨势过猛,根据我们跟踪的农产品价格数据,预计12月份的物价涨幅将回落。2011年的春节在2月初,1月份价格涨势很可能回升。若不幸遭遇灾害性寒冷天气,CPI有可能再创新高。如此看来,在这一段时间内,如果调控再次加码,可能的工具包括准备金率、汇率、利率和行政手段。
准备金率作为数量调控手段,使用灵活,决策程序相对简单,是央行最易使用的工具。因为存在其他影响货币数量的渠道,准备金率工具的选择需要以下条件:信贷投放超过了正常节奏、贸易顺差和外商直接投资继续处于高位;升值预期和“热钱”流入继续。当其中两个条件成立时,都有理由预期准备金率上调。
行政手段短期直接见效。自10月份起,发改委等部门开始采取一系列措施稳定物价,尽管目前政府像2008年初那样全面、直接管控价格,但是,若灾害性寒冷天气再次侵袭,行政调控可能加码。
利率。政府对动用利率工具可能有两大顾虑:一是2009年以来积累了大量的中长期贷款,提高利率将增加国有企业和地方政府的财务压力;二是外部经济形势仍有不确定性。我们认为,政策往往对基本面呈不对称反应,决策层倾向于夸大负面因素。美欧等发达经济体基本面恶化的可能性正在减弱,增长率低于中国的印度、巴西,甚至匈牙利都已多次加息,他们的外围环境并非好于中国。
如果现在不加息,通胀和负利率如何应对？若以后加息,是否在通胀再创新高之后才行动？若通胀还会创出新高,为何现在不加息？我们认为,加息问题和通胀一样,短期可以看紧一点,中期可以放松一点。
汇率。在我们看来,动用汇率工具有较大确定性。升值压力增加通胀压力,反过来,升值对通胀也有抑制作用。升值可以避免资源进一步向对外部门集中,促进产业升级,从而优化经济结构,还可以缓解管理层的担忧:当外围不确定性增加时,升值压力也扩大,升值替代加息还可以缓解中长期借贷主体的财务压力。不过,升值不能完全替代加息,至少它不能直接解决负利率问题。
按照确定性程度,预计上述工具使用的顺序如下:准备金率、汇率、利率和行政手段。
调控宜早不宜迟
如果以投资做比方,政府算是个天生的“右侧交易者”,等趋势明了后才做操作(出台调控政策),随着趋势深入逐渐加仓(政策加码),最后便容易“踏空”。政府作为市场中的最大主力,在趋势后期出手,容易助涨助跌,加剧经济波动。因此,对于通胀,调控政策宜早不宜迟。
虽然官方利率不变,但市场利率高企,可以想象,大的市场机构都以较高利率融资,中小民营企业、城市工商户和农村经营户的融资成本将更高,这不利于扩大就业。正规金融渠道里的大部分资金,以补贴方式(负利率)配置给财富占有或在资源分配中具有优势的群体,这个群体资金状况并不紧张,这种资源配置方式缺乏效率。
负利率进一步降低无风险收益率,导致风险偏好上升,容易滋生资产价格泡沫。美国次贷危机就是个教训。
政策滞后,调控起来就往往力度很大,因为力度不大不足以抑制趋势的自我强化。所谓过犹不及,严厉紧缩政策的不利后果,中国前期已有两次教训:1998年-2002年的长时间低迷,以及2008年底开始的经济快速下滑。虽然不利后果的出现源于国内外多方面因素,但决策层偏好右侧交易,也是不可忽视的原因。■
作者为华泰联合证券宏观高级研究员、中国社科院金融所博士后
【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: Failure to finish costs Red Knights
description.content:
CHESTER - Tim Redding didn't take any solace from watching his Reading High basketball team venture into the lion's den and nearly steal dinner.
The Red Knights coach just lamented the mistakes and missed chances that led to a pulsating 71-64 loss to Chester Tuesday night.
"We had a good second and third quarter, we just couldn't finish," Redding said. "There were a lot of missed opportunities."
The Clippers (5-0) don't lose often at home - just four times in the last seven years - but they found themselves trailing several times in the final quarter before cranking up the defensive pressure and dominating the final two minutes.
The Red Knights (5-1) led for the third and last time of the final quarter when Delvon Brown knocked down a short jumper, giving Reading a 58-56 advantage with 3:43 to go.
When Brown hit a 3-pointer off an inbounds play with 2:07 to go the Knights trailed only 62-61.
The Clippers turned up the heat at that point, using their fullcourt zone press to rattle the Knights into a string of mistakes and turnovers.
Reading turned it over a whopping 27 times overall, including seven times in the final 21/2 minutes.
Prior to the fadeout, the Red Knights stood toe-to-toe with a big and deep Chester team that's as good as anyone they'll face before March.
The Clippers kept the defensive heat on the whole way and pounded the offensive glass relentlessly, yet the Knights held their ground.
They were missing 6-6 starting center Lamondre Burge, who was ill, yet outrebounded the Clippers, getting another big effort inside from 6-4 Demerik Weglinski and some inspired play from Tae Huffman.
Weglinski finished with a game-high 22 points and grabbed 11 rebounds.
Huffman had 15 points, 11 rebounds and four assists.
Brown scored 17 points and had a big hand in keeping Chester senior guard Maurice Nelson under wraps. Nelson scored just two points in the first half and 11 overall. A year ago, in a win at the Geigle, Nelson went off for 38 points.
The Knights used the rapidly improving Weglinski to mount their third-quarter comeback. They trailed by as many as nine points three minutes into the second half before Huffman effectively began to drive the lane, then dish off to Weglinski underneath.
Despite playing against a front line that went 6-6, 6-5 and 6-5 at times, Weglinski converted 10-of-17 shots and scored 10 points in a 15-7 run that got the Knights back in the game.
They trailed by just a point at the end of the third quarter, then took the lead at 52-50 when Weglinski scored on a reverse layup with 7:06 to go.
The game was tied three more times after that and the lead switched hands three times before the Clippers, considered one of the top teams in District 1, finally began to assert control for good.
"Demerik had 11 points in the third quarter, then we just went away from that," Redding said. "Our guards have to continue to look down inside to him."
Some coaches might look at the Knights' effort, on the road against a top team, and see positives to build on. Maybe even claim a moral victory.
Redding wanted none of that.
"We have to improve," he said. "We see some patches, mentally and physically, that we need to get ironed out."
Contact Mike Drago: 610-371-5064 or mdrago@readingeagle.com.

event_or_fact.property: We have to improve; We see some patches, mentally and physically, that we need to get ironed out.
We had a good second and third quarter, we just couldn't finish; There were a lot of missed opportunities.
Demerik had 11 points in the third quarter, then we just went away from that; Our guards have to continue to look down inside to him.

description.hltext_display: Atletico: Simao file à Besiktas
description.content: Premier gros coup sur le marché hivernal des transferts. A en croire les informations du quotidien ibérique AS, corroborées par la presse turque, l'ailier de l'Atletico Madrid, Simao, se serait engagé avec le club du Besiktas Istanbul. En fin de contrat en juin prochain avec la formation madrilène, le joueur âgé de 31 ans voulait signer un dernier gros contrat et le club du Bosphore lui a en donné l'opportunité, puisque Simao percevra un salaire annuel de 2,7 millions d'euros, soit 200 000 euros de plus qu'en Espagne. La durée du contrat n'a pas été indiquée tandis que le club turc a versé une indemnité de transfert évaluée à 2 millions d'euros. L'international lusitanien jouera donc son dernier match ce mercredi soir en Coupe du Roi avec les Colchoneros, face à l'Espanyol Barcelone.

description.hltext_display: LA 갤럭시, '베컴, 유럽 단기 임대는 불가'
description.content:
[스포탈코리아] 한준 기자= LA 갤럭시가 데이비드 베컴의 단기 임대 이적에 제동을 걸고 나섰다. AC 밀란 이외의 팀을 통해 메이저 리그 오프 시즌 동안 유럽 무대 경험을 이어가고 싶다고 피력했던 베컴은 소속팀 LA 갤럭시와 마찰을 피할 수 없게 됐다.
3,200만 달러에 이르는 액수로 LA 갤럭시와 5년 계약을 맺은 베컴은 어느 새 LA에서 5년 차를 맞았다. 그 동안 베컴은 AC 밀란의 임대 선수로 활약하며 유럽에서의 명성을 유지했으나 이를 통해 미국 팬들과 LA 갤럭시 측과 충돌해왔다.
2010년 3월 밀란에서 입은 아킬레스 건 부상으로 시즌 대부분을 재활 시간으로 보낸 베컴은 컨디션 회복에 집중할 것이라며 임대 이적에 대한 의사를 보이지 않았었다. 하지만 메이저리그 시즌 막판 부상 복귀 이후 다시 유럽 무대로의 열망을 보였다. 이에 LA 갤럭시는 크게 반발하고 있다.
갤럭시 측은 “베컴의 임대 계획에 대해 전혀 아는 바가 없다. 그가 1월 말에 있을 프리시즌 훈련에 다른 선수들과 함께 합류하길 기대한다”고 공식 성명을 전하며 베컴의 단기 임대를 허락하지 않을 뜻을 보였다. 갤럭시와 계약 만료를 앞둔 베컴이 유로2012 출전의 꿈을 이루기 위해 과연 어떤 선택을 내리게 될지 귀추가 주목된다.

description.hltext_display: Набиуллина: Повышение налогов приведет в тупик
Policies prepared to ensure food security amid extreme weather
description.content:
The government has prepared three policies to ensure food security in anticipation of worsening weather affecting crops.
Coordinating Minister for the Economy Hatta Rajasa said the government would accelerate the distribution of cheap rice (raskin) to poor households.
Hatta was quoted by tribunnews.com as saying that the government would also tell the State Logistics Agency (Bulog) to stockpile rice besides controlling inflation and stable prices of rice on the market.
“We have to stabilize the price by maintaining rice stocks in order to protect farmers and consumers," Hatta said.
The policies were made during a meeting chaired by Hatta on Wednesday.
Also present at the meeting were Finance Minister Agus Martowardojo, Trade Minister Marie Elka Pangestu, Agriculture Minister Suswono, State-Owned Enterprises Minister Mustafa Abubakar and Deputy Minister of Agriculture Bayu Krisnamukti.

description.hltext_display: 流浪汉在立交桥下身亡原因不明
description.content:
昨天早上7点10分，一名流浪汉静静地躺在中央门立交桥下西北角的圆柱旁，再也感受不到阳光的温暖。偶尔有人停下来围观，更多的人匆匆走过，大 家不知他是谁，来自哪里，也不知他为何死去。
记者赶到现场后发现，在立交桥下西北角，一个人躺在地上，头靠着旁边的圆柱。警方已赶到现场，由于警方为他盖了一层布，看不见他多大年纪，穿的 什么，但依稀看见他脚边放了一双蓝色的凉拖。
报警的是小车司机刘先生，他当时正准备载客人，突然发现这名男子躺在柱子旁，手插在上衣口袋里，一动不动，旁边还有个蛇皮袋。“我开始以为他在 睡觉。”刘先生上前踢了下他的脚，准备喊醒他，但他没一点反应。“如果真是睡着了，我踢一下，他肯定会有反应的。所以我立刻觉得不对劲了。”刘先生上前将 手指伸到他鼻子前一探，大吃一惊，他已经没有了呼吸，刘先生连忙报警。民警赶到后，立刻为他盖上了一层布，并开始询问周围目击者。但大家都不认识这个人， 更不知道他来自哪里。
“可能是新来的，在这里的流浪汉我都认识，但我从来没见过他。”刘先生称，他对长期活跃在中央门附近的流浪汉非常熟悉，但就是没见过这个人。 “这人我昨天见过，他是个要饭的。”一名捡废品的大姐称，这人五六十岁的年纪，前天下午在中央门立交桥下乞讨。“他应该是新来的流浪汉，我们天天在这儿扫 马路，没见过他。”一名环卫工也说，前晚还没发现这人，但7点多来扫地时就看到了他。
120救护人员赶到后，火速下车为其进行了检查。布被掀开后，记者发现此人看起来五十几岁的年纪，人非常瘦，脸色蜡黄。他们遗憾地说，已经没救 了。
“这几天天不冷，按常理推断也不会是冻死的，可能他自身原本就有疾病。”不少围观者认为他是病死的。对于具体死因，警方仍在进一步调查中。

description.hltext_display: Rooney named UK's Celebrity Villain of 2010
description.content:
LONDON: Love-rat Wayne Rooney has been named UK's Celebrity Villain Of The Year.
The Manchester United striker's fall from grace follows his disastrous World Cup appearance for England and revelations that he cheated on his pregnant wife Coleen, 24, with a hooker.
The 25-year-old footballer polled 24 percent of the total vote, reports the Daily Star.
Meanwhile, 'X Factor' judge Cheryl Cole, 27, has been named 2010 Hero Of The Year.
She received the title after divorcing her cheating husband Ashley, 29, and surviving malaria.
Cole beat fellow celebs including Prince William's fiancée Kate Middleton, 28, Harry Potter star Emma Watson, 20, and film hunk Johnny Depp, 47.
The poll was conducted by virginmedia.com.

description.hltext_display: Villar anuncia la recepción del Papa Benedicto XVI a la selección
description.author: EFE
description.content:
EFE Será el próximo 14 de febrero de 2011 en una audiencia privada en la Santa Sede. Villar tuvo recuerdo especial para dos jugadores españoles como Iniesta y Xavi.
Angel Villar, presidente de la RFEF, anunció que el Papa Benedicto XVI recibirá en audiencia privada en la Santa Sede a una delegación de la selección española , encabezada por Vicente del Bosque, el próximo 14 de febrero.
En la tradicional cena de Navidad que la RFEF celebra cada año, Villar inauguró el 'el salón Vicente del Bosque' en la Residencia de la Federación, y afirmó que el año 2010 será inolvidable por el título conseguido por la selección española en el Mundial de Sudáfrica "donde España", dijo, "fue el mejor equipo dentro y fuera del terreno de juego".
"Trabajo, constancia, humildad", son datos que según Villar, representa Vicente del Bosque, quien recibió la ovación más cerrada de la noche por los periodistas deportivos cuando pronunció su nombre en el inicio de su discurso.
Villar se acordó de toda la familia del fútbol español -clubes, árbitros, jugadores de todas las categorías- y reiteró la importancia de este deporte en España, donde se juegan todos los fines de semana de 25.000 partidos.
El presidente de la RFEF explicó que, además del éxito de la selección absoluta, las chicas del Mundial sub '17 y el Atlético de Madrid, campeón de la Liga Europa y la Supercopa europea, forman parte del éxito del fútbol español en el año que termina. Un recuerdo especial Villar tuvo recuerdo especial para dos jugadores españoles como Iniesta y Xavi , aspirantes al Balón de Oro que entrega la FIFA, y para Pep Guardiola y Vicente del Bosque, candidatos al mejor entrenador del año.
"Es un año para el recuerdo. Y a ninguno de nosotros se nos podrá olvidar el recibimiento que tuvimos cuando volvimos de Sudáfrica", apostilló Villar.
Por otra parte, y según pudo saber EFE, España jugará un amistoso en Italia en el próximo mes de agosto.

description.hltext_display: Mercola.com Launches New Pure and Clear Drinking Water Filters
description.author: Mercola
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Mercola.com offers Free Shipping and Handling on Pure & Clear Drinking Water Filters from December 16 to 22, 2010 for orders to the Continental US and Canada.Natural health expert, Dr. Joseph Mercola, warns against toxic chemical disinfection byproducts (DBPs) in most municipal water supplies. DBPs are created when chlorine-based disinfectants chlorine, chlorine dioxide, or chloramines react with organic matter when added by local water treatment plants.Dr. Mercola points out that if two or more of these unwanted DBPs and other contaminants exist at the same time in your tap water, the synergistic toxicity greatly magnifies the negative effects to your health.The most common DBPs are trihalomethanes (THMs), volatile organic compounds (VOCs), and haloacetic acids (HAAs). THMs and HAAs have been found to cause cancer and liver disease in laboratory animals, while HAAs have been associated with central nervous system depression and skin irritation.A comprehensive study of U.S. drinking water also revealed that tap water may contain a number of hormonally active chemicals, including a potential human carcinogen and an endocrine disruptor.Key to a healthy lifestyle, pure water is a component of all bodily fluids -- blood, digestive juices, lymph, sweat, and urine, among others. Your body relies on water to support chemical reactions that regulate daily physiological functions such as blood and temperature regulation, detoxification, digestion, and respiration, says Dr. Mercola.Dr. Mercola teamed up with a company specializing in advanced water treatment products to produce two models of Pure & Clear Drinking Water Filters -- the Countertop and Under Counter filtration systems.These two easy-to-install systems use an advanced selective filtration process that combines carbon filtration, ion-exchange, and sub-micron filtration to remove 99.9 percent of chlorine, cysts, lead, THMs, and VOCs while retaining beneficial minerals like calcium and potassium.Pure & Clear Drinking Water Filters are currently undergoing certification by the California Department of Health, but are expected to exceed their expectations.Mercola.com offers Free Shipping and Handling to the Continental U.S. and Canada with any order of Pure & Clear Water Filter Bundles until December 22, 2010, 11:59 PM CST. Learn more about Dr. Mercolas Pure & Clear water products, including glass water bottles, shower filters, and whole house water filtration systems.About Mercola.comMercola.com is the world's most visited natural health website, averaging 14 million visitors monthly. It was founded in 1997 by Dr. Joseph Mercola, a licensed physician and surgeon in the state of Illinois and author of multiple New York Times bestsellers. Dr. Mercola was voted the 2009 Ultimate Wellness Game Changer by the Huffington Post, and has been featured in TIME magazine, LA Times, CNN, Fox News, ABC News, the Today Show, CBSs Washington Unplugged with Sharyl Attkisson, The Dr. Oz Show, The Doctors, and other major media resources. His mission is to ignite a transformation of the fatally flawed health care system in America, and to inspire people to take control of their health.###

description.hltext_display: 【かちまいアカデミー第２２期新講座紹介 くらし豊かに】（３）
TN senators help push START treaty
description.content:
WASHINGTON Tennessee's two Republican senators provided key votes Tuesday that advanced the START nuclear reduction treaty with Russia toward final approval. The two were among 11 Republicans who voted to end debate on the treaty that would cap nuclear warheads for both former Cold War foes and restart on-site weapons inspections.
Alexander, the No. 3 Republican in the Senate, said during a floor speech that even after the reductions envisioned in the treaty the country would still have "enough nuclear warheads to blow any attacker to kingdom come."
Alexander said he was swayed by President Barack Obama's commitment to spend $85 billion over 10 years to modernize the country's nuclear arsenal. Some of that money would go the Oak Ridge National Laboratory.
He also said the treaty would not interfere with the country's development of a missile defense system, an argument made by some of his fellow Senate Republicans.
Corker, a member of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, played a key role in putting together the guarantees on modernization of the nuclear arsenal.
In floor remarks, Corker recounted the numerous meetings and briefings he attended. He cited the various Republican-appointed military and diplomatic leaders who support the treaty.
"I firmly believe that signing this treaty, and that all the things that we've done over the course of time as a result of this treat are in our country's national interest," Corker said.
Conservative groups had targeted Corker for criticism after he voted for the treaty in the Foreign Relations Committee.
Today's final vote sees Obama poised for a bipartisan win on his top foreign policy priority.
"We know when we've been beaten," Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch of Utah said hours before Tuesday's procedural vote.
Ratification requires two-thirds of those voting in the Senate and Democrats need at least nine Republicans to overcome the opposition of Minority Leader Mitch McConnell and Jon Kyl, the GOP point man on the pact.
The Obama administration has made arms control negotiations the centerpiece of resetting its relationship with Russia, and the treaty was critical to any rapprochement. (2 of 2)"We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Foreign Relations Committee Chairman John Kerry, D-Mass., said after the vote. Obama has insisted the treaty is a national security imperative that will improve cooperation with Russia, an argument loudly echoed by the nation's military and foreign policy leaders, former Presidents George H.W. Bush and Bill Clinton and six Republican secretaries of state.
Conservative foes of the accord among them possible GOP presidential candidates Mitt Romney, Sarah Palin, Newt Gingrich and Tim Pawlenty argue the treaty would restrict U.S. options on a missile defense system to protect America and its allies and lacks sufficient procedures to verify Russia's adherence.
"The administration did not negotiate a good treaty. They went into the negotiations it seems to me with the attitude with the Russians just like the guy who goes into the car dealership and says, 'I'm not leaving here until I buy a car,' " Kyl said.

description.hltext_display: Count means House seats for red states
description.content:
Robert Groves, director of the U.S. Census Bureau, announces results for the 2010 Census at the National Press Club on Tuesday in Washington.
WASHINGTON - Republican-leaning states will gain at least a half-dozen House seats thanks to the 2010 Census, which found the nation's population growing more slowly than in past decades but still shifting to the South and West.
The Census Bureau announced Tuesday that the nation's population on April 1 was 308,745,538, up from 281.4 million a decade ago. The growth rate for the past decade was 9.7 percent, the lowest since the Great Depression. The nation's population grew by 13.2 percent from 1990 to 2000.
Michigan was the only state to lose population during the past decade. Nevada, with a 35 percent increase, was the fastest-growing state.
The new numbers are a boon for Republicans, with Texas leading the way among GOP-leaning states that will gain House seats, mostly at the Rust Belt's expense. Following each once-a-decade census, the nation must reapportion the House's 435 districts to make them roughly equal in population, with each state getting at least one seat.
That triggers an often contentious and partisan process in many states, which will draw new congressional district lines that can help or hurt either party.
In all, the census figures show a shift affecting 18 states taking effect when the 113th Congress takes office in 2013.
Texas will gain four new House seats and Florida will gain two. Gaining one each are Arizona, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Utah and Washington.
Ohio and New York will lose two House seats each. Losing one House seat are Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Missouri, New Jersey and Pennsylvania.
Florida will now have as many U.S. House members as New York: 27. California will still have 53 seats, and Texas will climb to 36.
In 2008, President Barack Obama lost in Texas and most of the other states that are gaining House seats. He carried most of the states that are losing House seats, including Ohio and New York.
Each House district represents an electoral vote in the presidential election process, meaning the political map for the 2012 election will tilt somewhat more Republican.
If Obama were to carry the same states he won in 2008, they would net him six fewer electoral votes under the new map.
Some states Obama won, such as Florida, tilted Republican in last month's election and the electoral votes they will gain could further help GOP candidates in 2012.

event_or_fact.property: results for the 2010 Census at the National Press Club on Tuesday in Washington

description.hltext_display: Two at Dr. Reddy's die after gas leak: reports
description.content: TEL AVIV (MarketWatch) -- Two workers at Dr. Reddy's Laboratories Ltd. /quotes/comstock/13*!rdy/quotes/nls/rdy (RDY 35.36, -2.35, -6.23%) were killed after gas leaked at a Hyderabad manufacturing facility, Wednesday media reports say. The company confirmed the deaths of the two people, one a staffer and one a contract worker, the reports say. The Economic Times reported that the plant produces active pharmaceutical ingredients. The police are awaiting medical tests to identify the gas that leaked, the newspaper reported.

description.hltext_display: 73.684: segundo quinto premio del día
description.author: LUCÍA PALACIOS | MADRID
description.content: 9 de la mañana de este 22 de diciembre. Comienza la Navidad con el tradicional sorteo de la lotería. Los bombos con las 85.000 bolas ya han empezado a girar. La suerte está echada y millones de españoles siguen con ilusión el transcurso de estas horas en las que la fortuna puede llamar a su puertas. Los niños de San Ildefonso comienzan a cantar los 1.787 premios que repartirán más de 2.320 millones de euros. 58.697 es el número de un quinto premio, el más madrugador, que se ha cantado a las 9.33 de la mañana. Dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, ha recaído en Galicia, Cataluña y Castilla y León. La principal novedad del popular sorteo es el cambio de sede. El objetivo es tener un espacio más amplio para la celebración. Según los datos facilitados por Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), el aforo del nuevo salón se eleva a unas 2.000 personas, frente a las 300 butacas que había en el antiguo salón. Otra novedad es la posibilidad de cobrar los premios grandes' al día siguiente, en lugar de tener que esperar nueve días para hacerse con el dinero. Los protagonistas de la jornada son los niños de San Ildefonso -que cantan los números y los premios- y los bombos, que, construidos con una aleación de latón y bronce, reparten suerte desde 2006. El más grande, el de los números, pesa casi 1.000 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 1,65 metros; el de los premios, más pequeño, pesa 125 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 0,60. A partir de las 9.00 horas da comienzo el espectáculo. Antes, todos aquellos que quieran comprobar que su número está dentro de los bombos puede hacerlo. Después, la suerte está echada. Los bombos comenzarán a girar y durante aproximadamente tres horas y media llegarán los 1.787 premios, entre ellos el 'Gordo' y otros doce premios mayores. El primer premio está dotado con tres millones de euros, lo que supone que el portador de un décimo agraciado se embolsará 300.000 euros. El segundo está dotado con un millón de euros (100.000 euros al décimo); el tercero con 500.000 euros (50.000 euros el décimo); dos cuartos premios dotado cada uno con 200.000 (20.000 euros por décimo) y ocho quintos premios dotado cada uno con 50.000 euros (5.000 euros por décimo).

description.hltext_display: ‘중국판 송혜교’ 재벌 2세의 연인으로
description.content:
CF모델데뷔 홍콩광고 장악
저우싱츠 ‘창장 7호’ 출연
귀엽고 섹시한 외모로 인기
남친 왕샤오페이와 결별후
숱한 염문설로 유명세
올해 중화권 연예계 빅뉴스라면 대만 인기 여배우 쉬시위안(徐熙媛ㆍ大S)과 중국의 재벌 2세 왕샤오페이의 초고속 혼인 신고다. 그러나 이들의 결혼 소식으로 ‘비련의 여주인공’ 또는 ‘재벌 2세 킬러’라는 프리미엄을 누린 여배우가 있으니, 바로 장위치(張雨綺)다.
그녀는 한국에서 한류 스타 송혜교를 모델로 성형한 중국 여배우로 잘 알려져 있다. 산둥(山東) 성 출신으로, 상하이희극학원 재학 중 CF 모델로 데뷔했다. 홍콩 ‘코미디 제왕’ 저우싱츠(周星馳)가 영화 ‘창장 7호’(2007년)에 여주인공으로 캐스팅하며 일명 ‘저우싱츠 사단’으로 분류된다.
비록 처음에는 ‘짝퉁 송혜교’ 또는 ‘저우싱츠의 여자’ 등으로 매스컴을 탔지만 섹시하면서도 귀여운 외모에다 재벌 2세들이 좋아하는 여배우라는 타이틀까지 붙으며 최근 주가가 급상승했다.
쉬-왕 커플의 깜짝 결혼 발표가 있기 전까지만 해도 장위치는 왕샤오페이와 공인 커플이었다. 지난 4월에는 공항에서 남의 눈을 의식하지 않은 채 뜨거운 키스를 나눠 화제를 모으기도 했다.
두 사람의 결별 이유를 놓고 설왕설래가 이어진 가운데 왕샤오페이의 모친인 장란(張蘭) 차오장난(고급 레스토랑 체인) 회장의 반대가 컸다는 얘기도 나오고 있다. 장위치가 직설적인 성격인 데다 섹시한 이미지의 여배우로 어필하는 점을 마음에 안 들어 한 장 회장이 아들과 떼어놓기 위해 거액의 위자료를 챙겨줬다는 설이 돌았다.
하지만 장위치는 결혼 소식을 접한 후 “두 사람이 행복하길 바란다”며 담담하게 축복을 빌었다. 이에 중국 언론들은 “장이 쉬시위안에게 고마워해야 할 것 같다. 덕분에 거물급 재벌 2세를 새 남자친구로 사귀게 됐으니”라며 새로운 염문설을 제기했다.
주인공은 홍콩 부동산 재벌 탕천(湯臣) 그룹의 차남 탕자청. 그는 재벌가 꽃남으로 손꼽힌다. 두 사람이 공항에서 다정하게 얘기하는 장면이 포착된 데 이어, 바로 그날 장위치의 미니블로그에 “당신은 나의 세계, 집에서는 내가 당신을 정복할 테야”라는 의미심장(?)한 글이 올라오면서 두 사람의 관계에 대한 관심이 증폭됐다.
또 다른 ‘카더라 통신’은 장위치가 새로 사귀는 남자는 중국 여배우 류타오(劉濤)의 부자 남편 왕커(王珂)라며 불륜 의혹을 퍼뜨리기도 했다.
재벌과의 염문설이 꼬리에 꼬리를 물자 장위치는 “왜 사람들이 나를 재벌 2세와 엮지 못해 안달이냐”며 “재벌 2세에는 관심 없다. 진정한 사랑만 원한다”고 말했다고 한다.
한희라 기자/hanira@heraldm.com

description.hltext_display: Senatul american, aproape de ratificarea unui acord istoric cu Rusia pentru reducerea arsenalului nuclear
description.content:
Senatul american decide miercuri în privinţa unui pact cu Rusia pentru neproliferare nucleară, iniţiat de preşedintele Barack obama, decizie politică ce ar putea schimba perspectiva ameninţătoare a armelor de distrugere în masă în următoarele decenii, scrie Reuters.
Acordul START, care prevede reducerea numărului de arme atomice la 1.550 în următorii şapte ani, a trecut deja uşor de câteva proceduri de vot în Senat şi se îndreaptă spre votul final care va fi pronunţat vineri.
"Suntem pe punctul de a scrie următorul capitol în istoria de 40 de ani a ameninţării nucleare", a declarat senatorul democrat John Kerry. Pentru a trece, actul normativ are nevoie de votul a două treimi din cei 100 de senatori. O procedură legislativă anterioară votului final a câştigat 67 de voturi , după ce 11 senatori republicani s-au raliat democraţilor.
De cealaltă parte, Rusia a fost săracă în dezbateri politice legate de tratat. Duma de stat nu a iniţiat încă nicio procedură de vot iar preşedintele Medvedev a anunţat ferm că nu va fi făcut niciun pas în acest sens până ce acordul START nu va fi aprobat în senatul american.

description.hltext_display: Trọng t�m kinh tế thế giới đang dời khỏi �u - Mỹ?
description.content:
Khối euro đang trực diện với hai cuộc khủng hoảng nghiêm trọng nhất kể từ khi đồng tiền chung ra đời. Hoa Kỳ vẫn lấn cấn với tỷ lệ thất nghiệp gần 10%. Trọng lượng kinh tế của các nước đang trỗi dậy ngày càng lớn.
Ngược thời gian trở về với mùa hè năm 2007, khi toàn cảnh kinh tế thế giới còn rất tươi sáng, và tỷ lệ tăng trưởng toàn cầu đạt đỉnh cao 5% thì cuộc khủng hoảng tín dụng địa ốc subprime đã bùng nổ. Tiếp theo đó đến tháng 9/2008, thị trường tài chính lớn nhất thế giới Wall Street đã trải qua một trận đại hồng thủy với vụ phá sản của ngân hàng Lehman Brothers và từ đó đén nay thì có thể nói hai chữ « khủng hoảng » gần như được gắn liền với các bài phân tích về kinh tế : cộng đồng quốc tế đánh mất 0,7% GDP trong năm 2009. Riêng đối với năm nay, chỉ số này đã tăng trở lại được gần 4%, cao hơn nhịp độ trung bình của thế giới trong 3 thập niên vừa qua (GDP toàn cầu tăng trung bình 3,5% trong giai đoạn 1980-2009). Nhưng khác hẳn với giai đoạn tiền khủng hoảng- trước 2008- các động cơ chính của con tàu kinh tế thế giới không còn được đặt tại Hoa Kỳ, châu Âu hay Nhật Bản mà đã được dời về khu vực các quốc gia đang trỗi dậy. Trong số này đứng đầu là Trung Quốc và Brazil.
Với trên 2600 tỷ đô la dự trữ ngoại tệ, Trung Quốc dư thừa phương tiện để « cứu nguy nhiều tập đoàn » của châu Âu và Mỹ lâm nạn. Chỉ riêng đối với ngành công nghiệp xe hơi, năm nay, hai « con chim đầu đàn » của Âu Mỹ là Volvo và Ford đều đã mở rộng cửa đón các nhà đầu tư Trung Quốc. Lại cũng Bắc Kinh đã tung tiền mua công trái của Nhật Bản : trong sáu tháng đầu năm, Trung Quốc mua 15 tỷ euro công trái của Nhật. Quê hương của ông Đặng Tiểu Bình gần như khiêu khích phần còn lại của thế giới với tỷ lệ tăng trưởng trên dưới 10%.
Trong lúc Hoa Kỳ và châu Âu đau đầu vì vấn đề nhập siêu, thì bộ Thương mại Trung Quốc cho biết, nội trong tháng 11 vừa qua, cán cân thương mại Trung Quốc thặng dư gần 23 tỷ đô la.
Về phần ông khổng lồ của châu Mỹ La Tinh là Brazil, thì nền kinh tế đang vươn lên này tạo thêm 2 triệu rưỡi việc làm trong 10 tháng đầu năm, thành tích chưa từng thấy này làm 19 nước còn lại trong khối G20 phải ganh tị. Song song với thành quả kinh tế, Brazil còn là một trong những quốc gia hiếm có trên thế giới có thể tự hào là đã đưa 20 triệu dân ra khỏi cảnh bần cùng trong vỏn vẹn chưa đầy một thập niên.
Tại châu Âu, sau khi tuột dốc không phanh vào năm ngoái, để thất thoát hơn 5% GDP, kinh tế Đức trong năm nay đã lấy lại phong độ một cách hết sức ngoạn mục : tổng sản phẩm nội địa tăng 3,4% nhờ vào ngành xuất khẩu rất năng động bất chấp tỷ giá đồng euro bị coi là quá cao so với đô la và yen. Thế nhưng trong toàn khối 27 nước Liên Hiệp Châu Âu thì nước Đức của thủ tướng Merkel cùng với Ba Lan gần như là những ngoại lệ.
Khối euro trong năm nay đã phải trực diện với hai cuộc khủng hoảng tài chính nghiêm trọng của Hy Lạp và Ailen phải thận trọng trước hiện tượng dầu loang từ Athenes và Dublin đến những mắt xích yếm kém nhất trong khối như là Tây Ban Nha, Bồ Đào Nha hay Ý.
Nhìn sang bên kia Đại Tây Dương, tại Hoa Kỳ, vấn đề « cơm áo gạo tiền » đã cướp mất đa số của Đảng Dân chủ ở Hạ Viện. Về mặt kỹ thuật thì nước Mỹ đã thoát khỏi khủng hoảng và quay trở lại với con đường tăng trưởng, thế nhưng đó là một tỷ lệ tăng trưởng èo uột và nhất là không đả thông bế tắc trên thị trường lao động.
Chuyên gia kinh tế Nguyễn Xuân Nghĩa từ California phác họa toàn cảnh chung trong năm 2010 của siêu cường kinh tế số 1 thế giới :
"Riêng kinh tế Hoa Kỳ hồi phục quá chậm.GPD sụt hơn 4% vì 18 tháng suy trầm thì vẫn chỉ tăng được có từ 1 đến 2%. Cả năm nay thất nghiệp mấp mé 10% và hiện nay là 9,8% dân số lao động. Trong số hơn 15 triệu người thất nghiệp có sáu triệu bị mất việc trên sáu tháng và đáng chú ý nhất : thành phần mất việc lại là người có chuyên môn và lợi tức hạng trung lưu, loại nhân viên cổ cồn áo trắng chứ không chỉ có công nhân áo xanh như trước đây. Song song, tài sản của nhiều người là ngôi nhà thì sụt giá vì nạn bể bóng gia cư từ năm 2006/200. Năm qua còn mất thêm hơn 4%. So với đỉnh cao năm 2006 thì mất một phần tư. Vì vậy, đa số đều thấy là mình nghèo đi".
Vì muốn đem lại một vài điểm tăng trưởng mà cả chính quyền Bush trước đây lẫn chính quyền Obama kể từ đầu 2009 đã không ngại tốn kém để « hà hơi tiếp sức » cho hệ thống kinh tế. Ông Nguyễn Xuân Nghĩa điểm lại những nỗ lực của chính quyền liên bang :
"Các định chế hữu trách đều áp dụng mọi biện pháp kinh điển như tiền tệ và ngân sách mà chưa công hiệu. Về tiền tệ, Ngân hàng Trung ương Mỹ cắt lãi suất tới số không và giữ nguyên ở đó đã tròn hai năm rồi. Đây là chuyện cực kỳ bất thường. Bất thường hơn nữa là Ngân hàng Trung ương còn in tiền, bơm bạc vào kinh tế hai lần liền, lần trước là hơn hai ngàn tỷ đô la, và lần thứ hai là thêm 600 tỷ trong tám tháng, kể từ đầu tháng 11.
Về ngân sách thì chính quyền đã hai lần bơm tiền kích thích trị giá 185 tỷ thời ông Bush và hơn 800 tỷ thời ông Obama mà chưa có kết quả. Ngày 17/12/10, lại thêm 858 tỷ được quyết định bơm thêm trong hai năm tới. Chưa biết kết quả ra sao thì ngân sách năm qua đã bội chi 1.400 tỷ, gần 10% GDP và còn bội chi nữa, nên chính phủ phải đi vay dù đã mắc nợ tới 87% tổng sản phẩm nội địa.
Một lý do giải thích là hai năm qua, chính quyền Obama và Quốc hội Dân Chủ không coi việc kích thích kinh tế và việc làm là ưu tiên mà lại tập trung vào việc cải tạo xã hội. Vì vậy cử tri mới phản ứng mạnh trong cuộc bầu cử tháng 11 khiến đảng Dân chủ thảm bại và ông Obama phải hợp tác với đối lập Cộng hoà để cứu nguy kinh tế".
Tại cường quốc số 1 thế giới, về mặt đối nội khó khăn kinh tế đã dẫn đến hậu quả chính trị tai hại đối với Nhà Trắng. Trên trường quốc tế, tổng thống Obama cũng tỏ ra bị lép vế so với lãnh đạo Trung Quốc, và đã phải đấu dịu trong cuộc đọ sức với Bắc Kinh trong hồ sơ tiền tệ. Chuyên gia Nguyễn Xuân Nghĩa so sánh :
"Tôi có chú ý đến chuyện lép vế ấy khi thủ tướng Ôn Gia Bảo của Trung Quốc thăm Ấn Độ tuần qua với cả trăm doanh gia trong phái đoàn. Sau ba ngày đàm phán với một nước xưa nay là đối thủ, đôi bên ký kết nhiều hợp đồng trị giá mười mấy tỷ đô la. Sau đó, ông Ôn Gia Bảo thăm Pakistan và dự trù ký 35 tỷ đô la hợp đồng nữa. So với kết quả chuyến thăm viếng Ấn Độ tháng 11/2010 rồi sự thất bại của ông Obama tại Seoul bên lề thượng đỉnh G-20 thì quả là Trung Quốc có vẻ vượt xa. Nhưng thật ra, thế mạnh của Bắc Kinh là thế ảo của nhà nước với 2.660 tỷ đô la dự trữ ngoại tệ tung ra mua chuộc thiên hạ trong khi xã hội bên dưới thì vẫn nghèo nàn lạc hậu".
Nhưng toàn cảnh kinh tế Hoa Kỳ không hoàn toàn u ám như mọi người lầm tưởng. Nước Mỹ của ông Obama còn rất nhiều chủ bài trong tay. Chìa khóa lớn nhất mà hiếm ai có được chính là sức mua của các hộ gia đình. Vấn đề đặt ra là chỉ cần các nhà đầu tư, giới doanh nghiệp mạnh dạn tin tưởng vào chính sách của Washington. Ông Nguyễn Xuân Nghĩa gắn liền hồ sơ kinh tế với môi trường chính trị ở Hoa Kỳ :
"Về việc cứu nguy kinh tế Mỹ, có lẽ tâm lý của thị trường sẽ là yếu tố quyết định. Các doanh nghiệp Mỹ đang có mấy ngàn tỷ bạc trong tay mà không dám bung ra làm ăn và tuyển dụng vì chưa yên tâm về chánh sách của nhà nước. Với Quốc hội mới, tình hình sẽ khá hơn và kinh tế có hy vọng đạt mức tăng trưởng chừng 4% vào năm tới. Nhưng thất nghiệp thì chưa thể giảm ngay, phải năm năm nữa thì may ra mới thấy lại tỷ lệ 5% trước khi bị suy trầm. Và quan trọng nhất, phải có một cuộc cách mạng trong đầu các chính khách thì mới đẩy lui được thói tật gây bội chi ngân sách và đi vay bừa phứa. Khi bội chi và mức công trái - là nợ nần của nhà nước - bắt đầu giảm thì tình hình mới đổi khác.
Chính là trong mấy năm thắt lưng buộc bụng để trả nợ sắp tới người ta càng tin rằng kinh tế Mỹ bị suy bại. Nhưng các chuyên gia không tin là Hoa Kỳ sẽ mất cả chục năm như Nhật Bản. Lý do là sau vụ bể bóng năm 1990, Nhật phản ứng chậm với nhiều quán tính và xứ này lại có dân số bị lão hóa, già nhiều hơn trẻ. Hoa Kỳ thì linh động và liều lĩnh hơn nên sau hai năm sai lầm vừa rồi, họ sẽ lại rút kinh nghiệm. Nhất là khi họ ý thức được là kinh tế Hoa Kỳ đã chuyển qua một hình thái sản xuất khác và cần loại giải pháp khác mà rồi họ sẽ tìm ra sau khi cho các chính khách một bài học".
2010 là năm kinh tế thế giới bắt đầu hồi phục. Cho dù mới chỉ ở giai đoạn đầu và theo các nhà phân tích thì đây chỉ mới là những tiến bộ rất nhỏ, nhưng sự bình phục đó được coi là « chậm mà chắc ». Có điều, như nhận xét của Marc Touati, phó giám đốc cơ quan đầ tư Global Equities ngày càng có nhiều nghi vấn chung quanh đồng tiền chung châu Âu. Khủng hoảng tài chính của Hy Lạp, rồi Ailen, những khó khăn chồng chất của Tây Ban Nha, Bồ Đào Nha, và trong một chừng mực nào đó là của vương quốc Bỉ, của Ý và cũng không loại trừ trường hợp của Pháp- đang làm sứt mẻ uy tín của đồng euro.
Kể từ khi đơn vị tiền tệ châu Âu này chào đời, 2010 cũng là lần đầu tiên mọi người đặt câu hỏi về « tuổi thọ » của đồng euro. Điều làm giới đầu tư lo ngại là khu vực đồng euro lâm vào bế tắc chính trị và khi đó người ta lo ngại là hệ thống tiền tệ chung châu Âu bùng nổ. Hy Lạp trong tình huống « dầu sôi lửa bỏng » hồi mùa xuân vừa qua, sang thu thì đến lượt Ailen bị đe dọa mất khả năng thanh toán. Nhưng 16 nước thành viên khối euro và nhìn rộng ra hơn là 27 nước Liên Hiệp Châu Âu lại không có cùng một quan điểm.
Trong khi đó chú Sam thì đang bước sang một mô hình phát triển mới mà ở đó tăng trưởng không nhất thiết tạo thêm công việc làm. Mặt khác Hoa Kỳ cũng phải hiện đại hóa cơ sở hạ tầng, và các trang thiết bị công nghiệp tránh để bị các nền công nghiệp còn "non trẻ" và năng động như Brazil hay Trung Quốc qua mặt.

description.hltext_display: 셀틱, 킬마녹과 1-1 무승부…기성용 도움 추가
description.content:
[스포탈코리아] 류청 기자= 셀틱이 킬마녹과 1-1 무승부를 기록했다. 기성용은 프리킥으로 도움을 추가했다.
셀틱은 22일 새벽(한국 시간) 셀틱 파크로 킬마녹을 불러들여 2010/2011 스코티시 프리미어리그(이하 SPL) 17라운드 경기를 치렀다. 3주 동안 폭설과 한파로 경기를 치르지 못했던 셀틱은 차두리와 기성용을 선발로 내세우며 승리를 노렸다. 결과는 1-1 무승부로 끝났다.
기성용은 팀이 0-1로 뒤지던 후반 39분 프리킥으로 토마스 로네의 헤딩골을 도왔다. 셀틱은 우위를 점하고도 킬마녹의 골문을 열지 못하다가 후반 막판 힘겹게 골을 터뜨렸다. 기성용은 팀을 패배에서 구했다.
경기를 주도한 것은 셀틱이었다. 셀틱은 공을 점유하면서 킬마녹을 밀어붙였다. 하지만 킬마녹은 단단히 수비를 갖추고 웬만해서는 기회를 내주지 않았다. 킬마녹은 후반 8분 코너 새몬이 선제골까지 뽑아냈다.
졸지에 밀리게 된 셀틱은 후반 스콧 브라운과 패트릭 맥코트를 교체 투입하며 반전을 노렸다. 셀틱은 후반 39분 경기를 원점으로 돌렸다. 왼쪽 측면에서 얻어낸 프리킥을 기성용이 오른발로 차 올렸고, 이것을 로네가 헤딩으로 연결하며 킬마녹에게 일격을 가했다.
결국 경기는 1-1 무승부를 거뒀다. 킬마녹은 셀틱 파크에서 55년 만에 승리를 노렸지만 뜻을 이루지 못했다.
한편 기성용은 이날 도움을 추가하며 리그에서 도움 숫자를 두 개로 늘렸다. 기성용과 차두리는 이날 경기 90분을 모두 소화했다.

description.hltext_display: СК предложил уголовно наказывать за нарушения прав дольщиков
Indians stay unbeaten against Brush
description.content:
Darko suddenly took some brightness from the Brush Beetdiggers' holiday mood Saturday night.
Coach Dan Kennedy's boys brought a three-game win streak into Yuma, but 6'6" exchange student Darko Vukasovic tallied 20 points as the Indians prevailed 54-41 in this final pre-Christmas contest.
Shane Terrell added 14 points for the undefeated host Indians (6-0). A 17-5 Yuma first quarter also became very tough to overcome.
The 'Diggers (3-2) closed within 22-14 by halftime only to be outscored 12-9 and 20-18 during those final two periods.
Seniors C.J. Kukus (15 points) and Kolby Wahlert (13) paced the BHS offense once again. Junior Colby Needens knocked down a pair of three-point bombs (six points), yet Brush's other players combined to hit only three baskets.
The BHS boys were coming off a big win over defending 2A state champ Holyoke Friday evening.
Vince Albo (three points), Gregory Mares (two) and Aaron Schoelkopf (two) completed the scoring. No other Beetdigger stats were obtained.
Sam Buacke and Jared Coughlin netted another seven points each for Yuma. Matt Bowland finished with four and Dalton McMurphy tallied two points.
Terrell, Voukasovic and Baucke teamed to bury six bombs from beyond the arc.
The Brush boys return to action when they visit Holy Family on Thursday, Jan. 5.

description.hltext_display: 工人将摩托车改成飞机试飞失败(图)
description.content:
山寨飞机
一个普通的退休工人造出一架“山寨飞机”，这事是真的。南京市浦口区盘城街道56岁的退休工人章德东用106天，在自家摩托车的基础上，制造出 一架“飞机”。昨天章德东在一条宽敞的马路上进行了试飞，虽然记者没有看到飞机升空，但章德东信心满满：“前几天试飞还飞了七八米高呢，我还会继续试飞并 进一步改进。”
□快报记者顾元森 文/摄
一句玩笑话
他造“山寨飞机”
章德东说自己是一家仪表厂的机械师。前两年退休后，有一次朋友聊天，章德东说了句：“我也能造飞机。”随后，他把家里一辆摩托车拆下来进行改 造，“一共花了106天。”章德东称，刚开始造时，老伴担心他的安全问题，明确表示反对，但看到章德东的“飞机”有模有样，就不反对了，“不少人退休后打 麻将打发时间，我搞这个不比打麻将强？”章德东笑呵呵地说。
真的很山寨
零件来自旧机器，“机翼”还能拆下来
螺旋桨是从鼓风机上卸下来的
主体机身由125摩托车改造而成
机翼宽近8米，由不锈钢管和帆布制成
水平尾翼和垂直尾翼也由钢管和帆布制成
昨天下午两点多，记者在盘城街道永丰村附近的一条马路上见到了章德东和他的“飞机”。
章德东说，自己造“飞机”没怎么花钱，很多零件都是其他机器上拆下来的旧东西。比如，摩托车把手下面的轴承是从碾米机上卸下来的，连接机身的链 条是从三轮车上卸下来的，操纵杆则取材于拖拉机，连接机身与机翼的钢架是自己买来的方形不锈钢管，固定钢管的钢丝是从卷扬机上卸下来的。
此外，“飞机”能拆卸。章德东说，“机翼上装了四个螺丝，可以拆下来。等会我可以再把螺丝卸下来，开着机身就可以回家了。”
能飞起来吗
昨天试飞全失败，“场地不好且有风”
在围观者的要求下，章德东决定试飞一把。他坐上座位，发动了摩托车，螺旋桨飞速转动起来，但这架“飞机”刚驶出两三米，右侧的机身便擦到了路边 的小树枝，“场地不太好，路不宽，而且长度也不够。”
禁不住众人鼓动，过了一二十分钟，章德东再次试飞，但“飞机”刚驶出四五十米，机身突然往右斜，最后机翼再次擦到了路边的树枝，章德东好不容易 才停下飞机，双脚在地上拖了好几米，“乖乖，还是人工制动嘛！”一名围观者打趣道。
章德东称，这两把试飞没成功，主要是因为场地不好且风力较大。“今天机翼兜风不太平均，容易跑偏，最好是无风。”
章德东说，这架“飞机”制成已经六七天了，刚制成时他曾经试飞过一次，当时“飞机”能离地七八米高，飞了好几十米。“今天上午飞机也曾经飞起来 过，不过只起来一两米高，很快就落了下来。”一名围观者告诉记者，如果“跑道”能长一些，可能会飞得更高更远。
章德东指着身边一名60岁左右的老汉，老汉叫刘文法，年轻时曾经是江西一家机场的机械师。刘文法指出，位于飞机后端的两个小滑轮需改进，因为飞 行器离地达到一定的高度，降落时会产生较大的冲击力，轮子很可能会撞坏。
对此，章德东表示会继续对飞机进行改造。
声音
他还要尝试，专家称不宜提倡
“我花了106天造出这个小飞机，如果下一步试飞成功，我想在机翼上喷上‘106’做纪念。”试飞没有成功，章德东并不气馁。
南京航空航天大学一名专家表示，民间自制飞机的成本太低，飞行安全无从谈起，近年来摔死摔伤者并不罕见，而且个人擅自驾机飞行也会对围观群众构 成一定威胁，此类飞行不宜提倡。
另外，我国的航空领域管制十分严格，目前对私人飞行器的升空飞行有严格的标准和审批程序，得到批准后才能起飞，私人制造简单的飞行器进行试飞应 予以禁止。

description.hltext_display: Intero Real Estate Services appoints Kevin Garty to Vice President of Relocation and Corporate Services
description.content:
Top producer and award winning expert in the corporate relocation industry partners with Intero to offer a relocation platform
Cupertino, CA (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
Real Estate and Relocation veteran Kevin Garty teams with Intero Real Estate Services to manage and expand the company's strategic relationships with relocation companies. Mr. Garty will work directly with established corporations as well as emerging startup companies to assist in their relocation and real estate needs.
Over the course of his 25 year career involving real estate and relocation, Garty has earned a reputation for excellence. A native New Zealander, Garty began his career in the mid 1980's by creating the very first relocation network in New Zealand and Australia as a direct response to the lack of specialized assistance available to relocating transferees to the region. After relocating to the Bay Area in 1992, Garty was called upon by Bob Moles to put his industry expertise to work by developing the relocation channel for Contempo Realty. After the company was sold, Garty went on to establish and build the relocation division for Cashin Company into one of the bay area's most respected providers of relocation and real estate services.
"We are really excited to have Kevin on our team because he has impeccable credentials and vast knowledge on how real estate and relocation works and his ability to expand the Intero® platform to include relocation services worldwide will be a huge benefit for Intero," said Bob Moles, Chairman of Intero Real Estate Services.
With a high commitment to service, Garty's Relocation Departments have won numerous awards over the years, consistently being recognized for superior service and unparalleled expertise within the industry. Garty has been responsible for over 4,000 transferee home purchases and home sales during the course of his professional career.
Gino Blefari, President and CEO of Intero Real Estate Services said about Kevin, "Our success has been built around finding the right people to lead us, and Mr. Garty has the vision, experience, expertise and relationships that we need to be successful in the corporate relocation industry."
In addition to having served on the broker advisory boards for many major U.S. relocation companies, Garty has been a speaker at ERC and BAPRM conferences and is frequently called on by Fortune 500 companies to advise them on various real estate and relocation issues.
"I am really honored to be joining the Intero family and to be introducing this innovative brand to the corporate relocation channel," says Garty. "I am joining some of the finest real estate minds in the industry today, along with a team that has deep roots within the relocation industry. It is a thrill to team back up with individuals who have a thorough understanding of what it takes to achieve a successful transfer, and to be part of an organization that has a real commitment to developing solutions that will assist clients in overcoming many of the challenges facing the relocation industry today. Intero has an innovative platform and a worldwide brand and I am confident that my team and I will be able to deliver a unique and remarkable experience to all that we assist."
About the Intero® brand
Founded in 2002, Intero Real Estate Services, Inc. has quickly become one of the premier real estate brands in the U.S. The company is private and headquartered in California's Silicon Valley.
Contact Teressa Francis +1 408 342 3010 tfrancis(at)interorealestate(dot)com
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4915464.htm

description.hltext_display: 十勝の農協取扱高２４００億円割る
ARMM's vast tourism potentials seen
description.content:
DAVAO CITY, Philippines (PNA) – The tourism industry in the Autonomous Region in Muslim Mindanao (ARMM) remains a work in progress in organization and promotion, according to an officer of the Mindanao Tourism Council (MTC).
Araceli Ayuste, chairperson of the MTC, said the recent third leg of the “B’yahe Ta Mindanao,” highlighting the tourist spots, destinations, and cultural activities of Maguindanao and Cotabato City had shown the vast potentials of the tourism industry in the ARMM.
“There is a lot to be done, but the area is full of tourism potentials,” she said.
As this developed, Ayuste suggested to the organizers of the colorful Guinakit Festival which recalls the entry of Sharrif Mohammad Kabungsuan, the first Islam preacher to Mindanao in the Pre-Hispanic Era, need to come up with several categories like a fluvial boat competition intended separately for big and small boats in order to draw more participation from the Muslim residents.
She observed that in the latest competition which involved 13 fluvial boats, the three biggest boats got the biggest prizes while the 10 smaller boats only received consolation prizes.
“They have to set the standard of categories to draw more participants,” Ayuste suggested.
She said the ARMM offers diverse cultural practices and places brought about by their rich history and religious beliefs which cater to Muslims and Christians.
Ayuste said the Our Lady of Lourdes Tamontaka Shrine and the Bolkiah Mosque are good destination sites for Christians and Muslims, respectively.
She also observed that North Upi also has vast tourism potentials particularly in agri-tourism.
Ayuste said the Kusiong beach resort located in Barangay Badak, Datu Odin Sinsuat, also offers a good place to unwind for the local tourists.
“The government needs to improve the road condition there to make the place more accessible,” she said.
Ayuste said the ARMM leg of “B’yahe Ta Mindanao” proved that the tourist spots in the area can be visited without the feeling of apprehension.
She observed that the spots are safe tourist destinations.
Ayuste led a contingent composed of mediamen, photojournalists, tourism officials and operators in visiting the sites of Maguindanao and Cotabato City from December 18 to 20.
Assistant Secretary Shalimar Amerkhan Candao of the Department of Tourism-ARMM said that the B'yahe Ta Mindanao ARMM-leg proved even to the ARMM government that its territory has vast tourism potentials.
She said Maguindanao and the cluster of island provinces of ARMM have many eco-tourism spots to offer.
“We hope that the ARMM government will help in pushing infrastructure development like roads towards these sites of destination for easier accessibility for both local and international tourists,” Candao said.
Naguib Sinarimbo, executive secretary of the ARMM said security remains a challenge for the local government due to the perception that the region is a conflict-affected area.
He said that while the military and police authorities still need to work hard to ensure the safety of tourist visiting areas of destination, it is as important of ridding the perception that the ARMM is a dangerous place.

description.hltext_display: هبوط الفائض التجاري لليابان
description.content:
قالت الحكومة اليابانية إن فائضها التجاري هبط بنسبة 55.4% في نوفمبر/ تشرين الثاني الماضي بالمقارنة مع نفس الشهر من العام الماضي بأول انخفاض في ثلاثة أشهر.
وقالت وزارة المالية إن الفائض وصل إلى 162.8 مليار ين (1.94 مليار دولار) أي أقل بكثير من توقعات السوق بوصوله إلى 446 مليار ين.
وارتفعت الصادرات الشهر الماضي بنسبة 9.1% إلى 5.44 تريليونات ين للشهر الثاني عشر على التوالي مع زيادة الطلب الخارجي على الصلب والآلات اليابانية.
كما زادت الواردات بنسبة 14.2% إلى 5.28 تريليونات ين مسجلة ارتفاعا للشهر الحادي عشر على التوالي مع زيادة الطلب المحلي على خام الحديد وعلى الأدوات السمعية والبصرية.
وزادت صادرات اليابان إلى الصين، أكبر شريك تجاري لها، بنسبة 18.3% في نوفمبر/ تشرين الثاني بالمقارنة بنفس الشهر من العام الماضي، كما ارتفعت الصادرات إلى الاتحاد الأوروبي بنسبة 10.1% وإلى الولايات المتحدة بنسبة 1.2%.

الإسم:
كتابة الإسم الثلاثي خيار إجباري والإبتعاد عن الكنية واللقب تفاديا للتشابه
البريد الإلكتروني:
ادخال البريد الإلكتروني اجباري ولا يظهر عند النشر
العنوان:
يكتفى بذكر اسم البلد أو المدينة .
التعليق: *
- المشاركة لا تتجاوز 500 حرف.
- المشاركة يجب أن تلتزم بالمادة المنشورة والمختار التعليق عليها، وبخلافه سيتم إهمال التعليقات التي تكون خارج الموضوع.
- يهمل كل تعليق يتضمن شتائم أو تعابير خارجة عن اللياقة والأدب.
- يهمل كل تعليق يقدح بشخصيات بعينها أو هيئات.
- تهمل التعليقات المتسمة بروح الطائفية والعنصرية أو التي تمس بالذات الإلهية أو تمس المعتقدات الدينية.
- تهمل التعليقات التحريضية والتعليقات التي تتضمن تهديدات لشخص او لجهة معينة.
- تهمل التعليقات التي تتضمن ترويجا لجهات أو هيئات أو لأشخاص بعينهم.
- تهمل التعليقات التي تتعرض للكاتب وشخصه في مقالات الرأي أو التحليلات أو تقارير المراسلين.
- يهمل التعليق المتضمن ملاحظات حول إدارة التعليقات أو ملاحظات أخرى عن الموقع بعيدة عن الموضوع المختار للتعليق عليه، حيث أن مثل هذه الأمور لها بريدها الخاص لتزويد الموقع بالملاحظات والاقتراحات العامة والطلبات هو Supportnet@aljazeera.net
- الموقع عربي فلا تنشر إلا المشاركات المكتوبة باللغة العربية.

description.hltext_display: The view from Capitol Hill
description.content:
Sen. Robert P. Casey Jr. (D-PA), U.S. Senate: 37 total votes, 0 didn't vote, 11 bills and resolutions sponsored
Reaction from Berks County-area congressmen to the number of U.S. representatives from Pennsylvania dropping to 18 from 19:
U.S. Sen. Bob Casey Jr., a Scranton Democrat: "The census data released today is unwelcome news that continues the long string of Pennsylvania losing congressional seats. The loss of a congressional seat increases the importance of the federal delegation working together along with Governor-elect (Tom) Corbett to make sure Pennsylvania's interests are well represented. I look forward to working with Senator-elect (Pat) Toomey and my colleagues in the House to make Pennsylvania's voice heard."
Rep. Jim Gerlach, a Chester County Republican: "It's so early in the process that nobody really knows what the new districts will look like. And ultimately, we are pretty much just spectators in this process. The Legislature and governor will decide how the redistricting map is drawn."
Rep. Charles W. Dent, a Lehigh County Republican; Rep. Tim Holden, a Schuylkill County Democrat; and Rep. Joseph R. Pitts, a Chester County Republican, could not be reached for comment.

description.hltext_display: Borussia Dortmund: Niegan que el Bayern tenga recompra por Hummels
description.content: Es una de las revelaciones de la temporada en la Bundesliga y se da por sentado que, no en mucho tiempo, se hará con un puesto en la selección alemana actual. El gran rendimiento de Mats Hummels como líder de la línea defensiva del Borussia Dortmund, no pasa desapercibido a nadie y tras su pasado muniqués (se formó en la cantera del Bayern Múnich), surgieron rumores de una posible recompra del cuadro bávaro. Ahora en el Westfalen se apresuran a desmentirlo.

description.hltext_display: Greens cynical about radioactive report (AAP)
description.author: Andrea Hayward
description.content:
Conservationists and the Australian Greens are cynical about the timing of a report giving the thumbs up for draft laws to establish a radioactive waste dump.
Energy Minister Martin Ferguson introduced the draft laws to parliament earlier this year, saying they would ensure the safe management of medical, industrial and research radioactive material.
A lower house committee was formed to examine the National Radioactive Waste Management Bill 2010 and tabled its report on Wednesday, recommending they be passed.
The laws would allow a site to be established anywhere in Australia rather than just the Northern Territory, overriding state and territory laws.
Muckaty Station, near Tennant Creek, is one of the sites the federal government has considered after it was volunteered by a branch of the Ngapa tribe in 2007.
But traditional owners of the site have taken their fight against the waste dump to the Federal Court.
The Australian Greens have described the process as a whitewash.
Greens MP Adam Bandt said the lower house committee had refused to hear from the public or the area's traditional owners.The committee's report says the issue has been the subject of earlier inquiries, including a Senate committee, and there have been opportunities for comment in those hearings.
"This is Martin Ferguson's appalling Christmas present for the people of Muckaty," Mr Bandt said.
The radioactive waste is now stored in suburban and regional areas across the nation under less than ideal management regimes, according to Mr Ferguson.
About 4000 cubic metres of low-level and shortlived intermediate-level radioactive waste has accumulated in Australia in the past 50 years.
Mr Bandt said the report asked Mr Ferguson to meet the traditional owners - but so far he hadn't."The traditional owners of the proposed waste dump site, Muckaty Station, have also written to him requesting that he meet with them," Mr Bandt said.
"Martin Ferguson has ignored them.
"Instead of asking why or inviting the traditional owners to appear before the committee, the house committee chose not to receive any public submissions or any new information."
The draft laws would override the wishes of traditional owners, said Mr Bandt who, as a member of the committee, gave a dissenting report.
He said it was interesting the report was tabled while parliament was not sitting and just three days before Christmas.
Australian Conservation Foundation spokesman Dave Sweeney said the committee process was a quick and dirty attempt to solve a long and dirty problem.
"The timing appears a cynical attempt to further avoid public scrutiny as the inquiry was not required to report until late March 2011," Mr Sweeney said.
"There is no reasonable rationale for putting out this report three days before Christmas, especially given that the Federal Court is set to consider this issue in January."
The proposed law would remove appeal rights from the Muckaty people, suspend key indigenous and environmental protection, and override all commonwealth, state and territory laws that could delay or frustrate the opening of a waste dump, Mr Sweeney said.
"It is not based on good science and does not follow a robust, open, transparent process.
"The federal government should stop pushing the contested Muckaty dump plan and establish an independent and public review of nuclear waste management options based on best science, transparent process and community inclusion and consent."

event_or_fact.property: it was interesting the report was tabled while parliament was not sitting and just three days before Christmas
the report asked Mr Ferguson to meet the traditional owners - but so far he hadn't.
The timing appears a cynical attempt to further avoid public scrutiny as the inquiry was not required to report until late March 2011
the lower house committee had refused to hear from the public or the area's traditional owners
